Malice/ Organics/ Hellplague/ Sweeps:
 
The shots impact against Malice's body, causing damage.  His attention was not on his injuries, but they started healing slowly.  He leveled the Chaos Breaker, and returned fire.
 
The Sweep carrying Organics was attacked from behind and lost it's hold of her.  She was powerless to help herself, and so fell, to crash to the ground in a matter of seconds.
 
Hellplague roared in pain as the Sweep worked on her arms.  Though he made progress, it was slow going.  With Organics out of their possession, Hellplague ordered the remaining Sweeps to attack one bot
 
Malice.
 
The Sweeps obey their master and mob attack the bounty hunter.  They could ove power him, but it was in question due to his great power.  They tried to beat and wear him down, not concerned with anything else.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare/Windlord/Rodimus/Windlord/Sedna/Nightstrike::

"Hellplague you're a real fool!!!!" roared BlackNightmare while she 
and Darkfate took NightStrike and started to retreat, but that let 
them fire some shots against Proto and Malice.

Windlord took off and tried to reach HellPlague and the Sweep that 
hold Organics. 

Sedna lockated at the Sweep and Organic and regarding tha she was 
higed than them she tried a dangerous strategy. She manouverat her 
wing with out fly in that way that she reached them and attemped to 
grab Organic and shot an energy ball against the Sweep.

Rodimus was supriced an alarmed, he knew that a Vork was controled 
Nightlight's body and she, suppostly had to be insolated in order 
that The vork being not be amenace to others... but what are she 
doing there??? what would happen next?





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, 
Devouring" <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Organics/ Hellplague/ Necross/ Malice/ Sweeps:
> 
> As the shearing sheet of metal exploded from the ground, 
Hellplague 
> roared.  Not in pain, but rage.  Her arms were not severed, but 
just 
> as useless.  They hung limply at her sides, as she fell back, two 
> Sweeps came and picked up their master.  Another came and picked 
up 
> the critically damaged Organics.  The Sweeps carried them into the 
> air and hung, as a Sweep attempted to repair Hellplague's arms.
> 
> Organics nearly passed out as Proto launched his ambush.  Though 
he 
> succeeded in disabling Hellplague, an edge of th metal sheet dug 
deep 
> into Organics' back, disabling her wings and limited the use of 
her 
> legs.  The Sweep who retrieved her roughly grabbed her about he 
waist 
> and jerked her with it.  
> 
> Necross rushed up and and opened fire with his acid blaster and 
> missile blaster.
> 
> Malice let a low gowl slip fom his throat.  
> "If only I had Sunstorm or other Seekers..!  This has gone on far 
too 
> long!"
> Malice turned his hateful glare to those who did not move.
> "Stay back cowards!  Interfer, and I send you to the Allspark!"
> He then marched forward, Chaos Breaker ready, and charged the 
> minions, Proto, and the Sweeps, not caring who was in his way.  
All 
> that mattered was the safe return of his sister Organics.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@c... wrote:
> >  Proto's liquid form had been following cracks and sensing his 
> taget until he was there. Without sound or warning his body became 
> sharp metal sheet expanding 12 feet upwards right directly under 
the 
> armpits of the minion.
> > > Malice/ Organics/ Hellplague/ Splattercannon:
> > > 
> > > The bounty hunter dis engaged the cannon and returned it to 
it's 
> > > sword state.  He held it at the ready and slowly approached 
the 
> > > hostage takers.  His body continued to glow brightly, even 
though 
> a 
> > > signifigant amount of power went into his cannon blast.
> > > 
> > > <Just hurry up and help!> Organics thought as Nightlight 
> > > acknowlegded.  She was injured, in enemy hands, and now almost 
> > > unconscious.  Hellplague had her off the ground, her feet mere 
> > > inches from the dirt.  Malice was on his steady advance, and 
> stopped 
> > > standing next to Rodimus.
> > > 
> > > The Sweep commander sneered as Malice approached.  She 
tightened 
> her 
> > > hold on Organics' neck, causing her more discomfort.  
> > > <Soon, Unicron will have the Matrix Bearer, a new follower, 
and I 
> > > will have my lizard as a pet.>
> > > Hellplague chuckled, and leered down at Malice.
> > > "Yes, come here.  Bow down before me, worship me, and I might 
> spare 
> > > your sister.  Become my servant, and all will be forgiven." 
she 
> > > laughed.
> > > 
> > 
> > > Splattercannon took position behind the hostage takers, 
holding 
> his 
> > > gatling rifle ready to waste anyone who moved without 
permission.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:

will

looked

could

> > > voluntary 
> > > > hostage..."
> > > > **********

> > > > Hydras picked up the com link and looking to MAxima 
said "Come 
> lil 
> > > > one... we will have some fun after all"
> > > > 
> > > > And leaves the base
> > > > 
> > > > **********
> > > > 
> > > > Nigthlight/Sedna picked up the com link and send aencoded 
> message 
> > > to 
> > > > Organics "Hold on... I'll be there shortly"
> > > > 
> > > > She quickly left Elita in a safe place and left the base, 
> flying 
> > > > quickly and covering to Battlefield
